VI.i.2.B.1.e
.
Actions to Take for Erroneous Payments
After discovering VA erroneously paid benefits to a beneficiary, determine whether the erroneous payment meets the definition of a duplicate payment.  If it
does, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 2.B.2
for adjusting the beneficiary’s award, or
does not, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 2.B.3
for determining whether it is appropriate to treat the erroneous payment as an administrative error.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Correcting the Erroneous Payment of Benefits to a Beneficiary
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
